where.expression: (('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (lower_limit_actual_translation)) OR ('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (upper_limit_actual_translation))) XOR (lower_limit_actual_translation < upper_limit_actual_translation)
where.label: WR1

where.expression: (('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (lower_limit_actual_rotation)) OR ('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (upper_limit_actual_rotation))) XOR (lower_limit_actual_rotation < upper_limit_actual_rotation)
where.label: WR2

where.expression: (('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (lower_limit_actual_rotation_1)) OR ('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (upper_limit_actual_rotation_1))) XOR (lower_limit_actual_rotation_1 < upper_limit_actual_rotation_1)
where.label: WR1

where.expression: NOT EXISTS(SELF.input_skew_angle)
where.label: WR1

where.expression: SELF\representation_relationship.rep_2.context_of_items :=: SELF\representation_relationship.rep_1.context_of_items
where.label: WR1

entity.name: kinematic_pair
entity.super.expression: ONEOF (revolute_pair, screw_pair, cylindrical_pair, spherical_pair, universal_pair, planar_pair, unconstrained_pair, fully_constrained_pair, point_on_surface_pair, point_on_planar_curve_pair, planar_curve_pair, prismatic_pair, gear_pair, rack_and_pinion_pair, surface_pair)

where.expression: joint.first_link = related_link_representations.rep_1.link_representation_relation.topological_aspects
where.label: WR1

where.expression: joint.second_link = related_link_representations.rep_2.link_representation_relation.topological_aspects
where.label: WR2

where.expression: transform_item_1 IN related_link_representations.rep_1.items
where.label: WR3

where.expression: transform_item_2 IN related_link_representations.rep_2.items
where.label: WR4

where.expression: frame_associated_to_background (SELF\item_defined_transformation.transform_item_1, curve_1)
where.label: WR1

where.expression: frame_associated_to_background (SELF\item_defined_transformation.transform_item_2, curve_2)
where.label: WR2

where.expression: SELF\simple_pair_range.applies_to_pair\planar_curve_pair.curve_1 :=: range_on_curve_1.basis_curve
where.label: WR1

where.expression: SELF\simple_pair_range.applies_to_pair\planar_curve_pair.curve_2 :=: range_on_curve_2.basis_curve
where.label: WR2

where.expression: (('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (lower_limit_actual_rotation)) OR ('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (upper_limit_actual_rotation))) XOR (lower_limit_actual_rotation < upper_limit_actual_rotation)
where.label: WR1

where.expression: (('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (lower_limit_actual_translation_x)) OR ('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (upper_limit_actual_translation_x))) XOR (lower_limit_actual_translation_x < upper_limit_actual_translation_x)
where.label: WR2

where.expression: (('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (lower_limit_actual_translation_y)) OR ('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (upper_limit_actual_translation_y))) XOR (lower_limit_actual_translation_y < upper_limit_actual_translation_y)
where.label: WR3

where.expression: frame_associated_to_background (SELF\item_defined_transformation.transform_item_1, pair_curve)
where.label: WR1

where.expression: SELF\simple_pair_range.applies_to_pair\ point_on_planar_curve_pair.pair_curve :=: range_on_pair_curve.basis_curve
where.label: WR1

where.expression: (('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (lower_limit_yaw)) OR ('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (upper_limit_yaw))) XOR (lower_limit_yaw < upper_limit_yaw)
where.label: WR2

where.expression: (('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (lower_limit_pitch)) OR ('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (upper_limit_pitch))) XOR (lower_limit_pitch < upper_limit_pitch)
where.label: WR3

where.expression: (('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (lower_limit_roll)) OR ('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (upper_limit_roll))) XOR (lower_limit_roll < upper_limit_roll)
where.label: WR4

where.expression: frame_associated_to_background (SELF\item_defined_transformation.transform_item_1, pair_surface)
where.label: WR1

where.expression: SELF\simple_pair_range.applies_to_pair\point_on_surface_pair.pair_surface :=: range_on_pair_surface.basis_surface
where.label: WR1

where.expression: (('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (lower_limit_yaw)) OR ('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (upper_limit_yaw))) XOR (lower_limit_yaw < upper_limit_yaw)
where.label: WR2

where.expression: (('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (lower_limit_pitch)) OR ('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (upper_limit_pitch))) XOR (lower_limit_pitch < upper_limit_pitch)
where.label: WR3

where.expression: (('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (lower_limit_roll)) OR ('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (upper_limit_roll))) XOR (lower_limit_roll < upper_limit_roll)
where.label: WR4

where.expression: (('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (lower_limit_actual_translation)) OR ('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (upper_limit_actual_translation))) XOR (lower_limit_actual_translation < upper_limit_actual_translation)
where.label: WR1

where.expression: (('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (lower_limit_rack_displacement)) OR ('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (upper_limit_rack_displacement))) XOR (lower_limit_rack_displacement < upper_limit_rack_displacement)
where.label: WR1

where.expression: (('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (lower_limit_actual_rotation)) OR ('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (upper_limit_actual_rotation))) XOR (lower_limit_actual_rotation < upper_limit_actual_rotation)
where.label: WR1

where.expression: (('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (lower_limit_actual_rotation)) OR ('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (upper_limit_actual_rotation))) XOR (lower_limit_actual_rotation < upper_limit_actual_rotation)
where.label: WR1

entity.name: simple_pair_range
entity.super.expression: ONEOF (revolute_pair_range, prismatic_pair_range, screw_pair_range, cylindrical_pair_range, spherical_pair_range, universal_pair_range, planar_pair_range, point_on_surface_pair_range, surface_pair_range, point_on_planar_curve_pair_range, planar_curve_pair_range, gear_pair_range, rack_and_pinion_pair_range) ANDOR pair_actuator

where.expression: (('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (lower_limit_yaw)) OR ('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (upper_limit_yaw))) XOR (lower_limit_yaw < upper_limit_yaw)
where.label: WR1

where.expression: (('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (lower_limit_pitch)) OR ('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (upper_limit_pitch))) XOR (lower_limit_pitch < upper_limit_pitch)
where.label: WR2

where.expression: (('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (lower_limit_roll)) OR ('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (upper_limit_roll))) XOR (lower_limit_roll < upper_limit_roll)
where.label: WR3

where.expression: frame_associated_to_background (SELF\item_defined_transformation.transform_item_1, surface_1)
where.label: WR1

where.expression: frame_associated_to_background (SELF\item_defined_transformation.transform_item_2, surface_2)
where.label: WR2

where.expression: SELF\simple_pair_range.applies_to_pair\surface_pair.surface_1 :=: range_on_surface_1.basis_surface
where.label: WR1

where.expression: SELF\simple_pair_range.applies_to_pair\surface_pair.surface_2 :=: range_on_surface_2.basis_surface
where.label: WR2

where.expression: (('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (lower_limit_actual_rotation)) OR ('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (upper_limit_actual_rotation))) XOR (lower_limit_actual_rotation < upper_limit_actual_rotation)
where.label: WR3

where.expression: COS (plane_angle_for_pair_in_radian (SELF, skew_angle)) > 0.0
where.label: WR1

where.expression: (('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (lower_limit_first_rotation)) OR ('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (upper_limit_first_rotation))) XOR (lower_limit_first_rotation < upper_limit_first_rotation)
where.label: WR1

where.expression: (('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (lower_limit_second_rotation)) OR ('KINEMATIC_STRUCTURE_SCHEMA.UNLIMITED_RANGE' IN TYPEOF (upper_limit_second_rotation))) XOR (lower_limit_second_rotation < upper_limit_second_rotation)
where.label: WR2

function.name: convert_plane_angle_for_pair_from_radian
plane_angle_for_pair_in_radian
representation_of_link
